review: Easy to set up. Upgrade was required and completed.
author: James L. Thornburg

review: Easy to set up, and easier to use. Completely satisfied.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Works great. Great price. Shipping was slow however.I had expected two day shipping as I am an amazon prime member.
author: Jennifer Wipperfurth

review: I love my Fire TV Stick.
author: Donna Hudgins

review: Even though it was back ordered, this was to be expected right after Christmas, it arrived earlier than the expected delivery date. Works great! My husband will look forward to his baseball games all season long.
author: Marian G.

review: It was very easy to install and start using. So glad I bought it.
author: Unknown

review: Prime and the Fire TV stick were meant for each other! Love the prime movies and the access to Amazon Photos is awesome. Already thinking of buying another one.
author: mcarm

review: I am very disappointed in it.  I wish I had bought another Roku instead ofFirestick.  I cannot get the channels I get on Roku, which are NorthpointCommunity Church, Joyce Meyer, Greg Laurie and a few other pastors..I amhoping they will be added as time goes on.
author: LT Hall
